document.full_text: schlumberger ltd , the world's largest oilfield services company, expects turmoil in the middle east and africa to knock 8 to 10 cents per share off first-quarter profit, chief executive andrew gould said on monday.
document.title: schlumberger sees modest hit from africa, mideast
lines_and_colors: schlumberger ltd , the world's largest oilfield services company, expects turmoil in the middle east and africa to knock 8 to 10 cents per share off first-quarter profit, chief executive andrew gould said on monday.
